text: "Endless Summer Nights" is a 1988 song by Richard Marx and is the third single from his debut studio album Richard Marx. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Canada, number 13 in Sweden, number 16 in Australia and number 42 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== #"Endless Summer Nights" [edit] (Marx) â€“ 4:11 ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Richard Marx songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Endless Summer Nights
